name: Pepper Garden Spicy Crush - Match 3 Farm Frozen And Frenzy Mania Games
name_original: Pepper Garden Spicy Crush - Match 3 Farm Frozen And Frenzy Mania Games
description:
Get ready for Pepper Garden Spicy Crush time!! Start a fun-tastic puzzle solving quest, There're tons of surprises for you to discover. Come on into this amazingly tasty farm garden mania world, and begin enjoying 500 levels of delicious challenges NOW!!!

Features:
- 500+ sweet levels to explore! (LV new update soon.)
- Easy to learn and enjoyable match 3 game for the young & young at heart!
- A new flavor of matching puzzle game, challenging and delicious.
- Unique power-ups specially designed in each levels.
- Innovative new gameplay: clear a way to collect the target animals.
